attributes.action: Allow cancer treatment charity  centres to  reopen for Oxygen  therapy
attributes.additional_details: Because it helps the symptoms  of  cancer..fibromyalgia ...brain tumours  multiple  sclerosis  and general health no end  easing pain increasing  energy and helps to focus on recovering
attributes.background: Allow cancer treatment oxygen therapy charity   centres to reopen for alternative  treatments  to fight this illness and other illnesses

rejection.details: Since you started your petition some centres have reopened. It's a decision for other centres whether or not they are able to safely reopen.
